title: IDerivedPatternFeatureData.ISetSeedComponentArray
description: Sets an array of the seed component features for this derived pattern feature.
signature:
void ISetSeedComponentArray( 
   System.Int32
FeatCount
,
   ref System.Object
ArrayDataIn
)

parameters.name: ArrayDataIn
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of seed component features (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
You can pass a mixed array of
IComponent2
and
IFeature
objects representing components.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
